fields.question: How do I create a new project?
fields.answer: Click 'New Project', add name, description, templates, and visibility settings.

fields.question: Can I duplicate projects?
fields.answer: Yes, use the 'Duplicate Project' option to clone structure and tasks.

fields.question: How do I archive projects?
fields.answer: Open project settings ‚Üí Archive. You can restore anytime.

fields.question: How do I create tasks?
fields.answer: Inside any project, click '+ Add Task', enter details, assign users, and set deadlines.

fields.question: Can I add subtasks?
fields.answer: Yes, each task supports unlimited subtasks for better breakdown.

fields.question: What task views are available?
fields.answer: List, Kanban, Calendar, Gantt Chart, and Table view are supported.

fields.question: How do I invite team members?
fields.answer: Go to Project Settings ‚Üí Team Members ‚Üí Invite users via email.

fields.question: What permission levels exist?
fields.answer: Admin, Editor, Commenter, and Viewer roles are supported.

fields.question: How does real-time collaboration work?
fields.answer: Comments, mentions, file attachments, and live updates are supported.

fields.question: What can I automate?
fields.answer: Task assignment, tag updates, priority adjustments, and notifications.

fields.question: How do I create automation rules?
fields.answer: Go to Automation ‚Üí Create Rule ‚Üí select trigger and action.

fields.question: Do automations run instantly?
fields.answer: Yes, all rules run instantly after matching triggers are detected.

fields.question: How do I track project progress?
fields.answer: Use dashboards, milestone tracking, burndown charts, and analytics.

fields.question: Can I export reports?
fields.answer: Yes, all analytics can be exported as PDF, CSV, or Excel.

fields.question: Can I track time spent?
fields.answer: Yes, use time logging to track hours per task or user.
